titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Joseph F. Bunnett is Professor Emeritus of Chemistry at the University of California, Santa Cruz. He founded the journal Accounts of Chemical Research in 1966, and served as its editor until 1986.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records from the Accounts of Chemical Research. Included in the collection are records of articles published between 1968 and 1988 with review tracking sheets, editor's and reviewers' comments and correspondence about the articles; polls and ratings for potential authors; an editorial procedure manual, with form letters and sample forms; materials relating to the publication of topical collections of Accounts; invitations to submit articles to Accounts; and other correspondence.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
